SOLD
Hi, I’m selling a 6 card lot of t206s. 3 are Polar Bears, 1 Old Mill, and both Abbaticchio poses. I would like SOLD for the lot with payment of a PayPal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]. I will pay for shipping.

Thanks,
Joe
